entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
